scripts.dev:firefox: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx webextension-toolbox dev firefox
scripts.dev:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx webextension-toolbox dev chrome
scripts.build:firefox: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx webextension-toolbox build firefox && cd dist/firefox && zip -r dial-firefox-$(date +%y%m%d).zip manifest.json main.js main.css index.html _locales/** && cp *.zip ../ && cd .. && rimraf rm -rf ./firefox
scripts.build:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx webextension-toolbox build chrome && cd dist/chrome && zip -r dial-chrome-$(date +%y%m%d).zip manifest.json main.js main.css index.html _locales/** && cp *.zip ../ && cd .. && rimraf rm -rf ./chrome
